segments.text: I notice the window letting in daylight, showing a neat garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area has the woman facing away, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's running full blast, and the basin is full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over the edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, with one foot already wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, cabinets are open with a cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy on a stool reaches in, holding a plate awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unsteady, legs spread out unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her arm up, expecting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a typical kitchen scene turning risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the water will reach the kids soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
